statements: SELECT * FROM SalesOrders;
SELECT id, order_date, order_total FROM SalesOrders WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT id, order_date, order_total FROM SalesOrders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM SalesOrders WHERE customer_id = 456 ORDER BY order_total DESC;
SELECT id, order_date, SUM(order_total) AS total_sales FROM SalesOrders GROUP BY id, order_date;
SELECT * FROM SalesOrders WHERE order_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, order_date, order_total FROM SalesOrders WHERE customer_id = 123 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT id, customer_id, sum(order_total) AS total_spent FROM SalesOrders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_spent > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(order_total) AS avg_order FROM SalesOrders GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY avg_order DESC;
SELECT * FROM SalesOrders WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM Customers WHERE country = 'USA');
SELECT * FROM sales_orders;
SELECT order_id, total_amount, order_date, customer_id FROM sales_orders;
SELECT customer_id, order_date, total_amount, order_id FROM sales_orders;
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM sales_orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, order_date FROM sales_orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date, total_amount FROM sales_orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY order_date DESC
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(order_id) AS num_orders FROM sales_orders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING num_orders > 5
SELECT sum(total_amount) AS total_sales FROM sales_orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT product_id, stock_quantity FROM inventory_levels WHERE stock_quantity < 10 ORDER BY stock_quantity ASC
SELECT customer_id, AVG(total_amount) AS avg_order_amount FROM sales_orders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING avg_order_amount > 1000
SELECT * FROM orders
SELECT order_id, customer_id FROM orders WHERE order_date = '2022-01-01'
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory
SELECT * FROM shipments WHERE shipping_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY shipment_id DESC
SELECT order_id, shipping_date FROM shipments JOIN orders ON shipments.order_id = orders.order_id
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date FROM orders WHERE customer_id = 1001
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT * FROM orders JOIN shipments ON orders.order_id = shipments.order_id
SELECT order_id, COUNT(*) AS num_shipments FROM shipments GROUP BY order_id HAVING num_shipments > 1
SELECT * FROM SalesOrders;
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM SalesOrders WHERE customer_id = '1111-2222-3333';
SELECT product_id, quantity FROM InventoryLevels WHERE price > 100.00 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM ShipmentDetails ORDER BY shipped_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT order_id, product_id, quantity FROM OrderFulfillment WHERE fulfillment_id = '8888-9999-0000';
SELECT * FROM SalesOrders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM SalesOrders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_spent > 1000;

SELECT SalesOrders.order_id, SalesOrders.order_date, InventoryLevels.product_name, OrderFulfillment.quantity FROM SalesOrders JOIN OrderFulfillment ON SalesOrders.order_id = OrderFulfillment.order_id JOIN InventoryLevels ON OrderFulfillment.product_id = InventoryLevels.product_id;
SELECT order_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM OrderFulfillment GROUP BY order_id ORDER BY total_quantity DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT ShipmentDetails.shipped_date, SalesOrders.order_date, ShipmentDetails.shipping_address FROM ShipmentDetails JOIN SalesOrders ON ShipmentDetails.order_id = SalesOrders.order_id WHERE ShipmentDetails.shipped_date > SalesOrders.order_date;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM Products;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM SalesOrders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT product_name, unit_price, category FROM Products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT * FROM SalesOrders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 101
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM Products WHERE category = 'Electronics' AND unit_price < 500 ORDER BY unit_price ASC
SELECT order_id, SUM(total_amount) AS total_sales FROM SalesOrders GROUP BY order_id HAVING total_sales > 2000
SELECT shipment_date, status FROM ShipmentDetails WHERE status IN ('Shipped', 'Delivered')
